name: Neko Loop
description:
Welcome to Neko Loop.

Neko Loop is a roguelike game with resource management and constant progression where your decisions have great influence on the course of each game.
Unlock secrets, defeat bosses, meet characters and do your best to help Selina get back home.



EQUIPMENT SYSTEM


Equip powerful items and become stronger.





CARDS AND RESOURCES:


Unlock cards with various effects, get resources and use them to your advantage






COMBAT


Face a variety of enemies in intense battles:



And much more!
